title: Ep238 A$$holes in History
description:
This week, the gals dish about some real jerks who changed the course of history, despite themselves. Topics include a neighborhood bully who turned RULL sadistic, an alcoholic Civil War general with no regard for life, and everything you ever wanted to know about the anal canal (and then some). Treat yourself to a glass of Spring Gate Winery's Rénové Sweet Red, be honest with yourself, and tune in for A$$holes in History.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
Wine & Crime LIVE October 1st! Tickets here: https://www.momenthouse.com/wineandcrime
